mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.DTM_APPL_ID AS applID, A.EMP_ID AS empId, A.DTM_TYPE_CD AS dtmCode, C.DTM_NM AS dtmName, A.STD_DATE AS startDate, A.END_DATE AS endDate, A.TZ_DATE AS applDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.TZ_DATE DESC) AS rnum FROM OHR.DTM_APPL A JOIN OHR.DTM_CD C ON A.DTM_TYPE_CD = C.DTM_CD WHERE A.TZ_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit} ORDER BY applDate DESC
